cab.content: BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 10th JUNE, 1918,1. The enemy continued his attacks this morning on the NOYON - MONTDIDIER front and has made some progress, especially in the valley of the MATZ and towards the IvIONTDIDIER - OOIIPIEGllE roado He. also attacked strongly between FiERY and south west of BELLOYo No details of the progress of these attacks are forth-c oming at p^e s ent.German losses in yesterday's and to-day1s fighting are considered severe,, especially on the flanks. So far 14 German divisions have been identified *2, On the rest of the front the situation remains unchanged,aeral Staff,War Office, ScVM. . lOth June; 1918cIssued at 6-.45 pcm.
